expiryDateTime.description: Do not present this information after this time. ISO 8601, UTC

heading.description: Optional. The heading to be displayed.

displayDurationSeconds.description: Optional. The recommended number of seconds the deviation information shall be presented. This value depends on the number of items and content type, reflecting the time it takes for a passenger to read it.

message.description: Optional. Text to be presented instead of situation messages when no deviation information is available due to technical problems or similar.
examples: Due to technical problems, deviation information cannot be displayed at the moment.

situationMessages.title: Situation Messages
situationMessages.description: A list of situation messages that are currently relevant to the passengers onboard the vehicle at this point in the vehicle journey.
